mapper.sql: id, stockcode, stockname, rightstype, dealway, addtime, validtime, endtime, enquiryPrice, realPrice, exchangetype, enquirytype, enquirytime, principalBalance, createtime, oid, agent
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from stock_principal
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into stock_principal (id, stockcode, stockname, rightstype, dealway, addtime, validtime, endtime, enquiryPrice, realPrice, exchangetype, enquirytype, enquirytime, principalBalance, createtime, oid, agent) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enquiryprice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{realprice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{exchangetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enquirytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enquirytime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{principalbalance,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update stock_principal
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

stockname = #{record.stockname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
